data.text: @TechWontWork @JustinBrannan You don’t like Covidians? How about Bycyclistas for you and your fellow travelers? Pedalistas work for you?
@TechWontWork @JustinBrannan We had it after 9/11 too.  It was confusing and completely worthless other than cable news channels posting it in a small box.
@TechWontWork @JustinBrannan Reading is fundamental.  You miss the point.
@PeteTheRetCop @JustinBrannan Yes low-to-high risk scale is SO confusing!! But glad you could use your catchphrase finally.

@JustinBrannan Ask an average NYer what the definition of community spread is. This is a chart for Covidians to virtue signal for other Covidians.  If you did one for a Russian Nuclear attack, I’d say more people would get it.
